::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod hears Data ask for the Matrix.
"Ok, I'll get it, but its locked in the ship. It'll take a few minutes."
Hot Rod turns to Kluster.
"Kluster, come with me! We got to get the Maximal Matrix!"
